Title: Help - FAB Visibility
Description: Verify Help Floating Action Button appears only when logged in
Steps: Observe bottom right corner of the screen.
Expected Result: Help FAB (Question mark icon) is visible.

Title: Help - Open/Close Panel
Description: Verify opening and closing the functionality of the Help Panel

Title: Help - Open/Close Panel
Steps: Click the 'X' close button in the panel header.

Title: Help - FAQ Display
Description: Verify FAQs are displayed by default
Steps: Observe the initial content of the Help Panel.
Expected Result: 'FAQ' tab is active. List of frequently asked questions is visible.

Title: Help - Submit Bug Report
Steps: Enter a description in the text area.

Title: Help - Submit Bug Report
Expected Result: Success message 'Your report has been sent...' appears below the button. Panel remains open.

Title: Help - Submit Feature Request
Expected Result: Success message appears. Description field is cleared automatically. Panel remains open.

Title: Help - Mobile Access
Description: Verify Help system usability on mobile devices
